Product Notes

From acclaimed writer and director Clive Barker (Hellraiser, Nightbreed, Candyman) comes the contemporary cult classic, Lord of Illusions, a masterpiece of the horror and supernatural genres. Scott Bakula (TV's Quantum Leap, TV's Star Trek: Enterprise, TV's NCIS: New Orleans) portrays Harry D'Amour, a private detective specializing in the occult hired to protect Philip (Kevin J. O'Connor, There Will Be Blood, The Mummy, Van Helsing) and Dorothea Swann (Famke Janssen, GoldenEye, X-Men, Taken) from reincarnat
